00046 /*!
00047  * \brief Reload asterisk modules.
00048  * \param name the name of the module to reload
00049  *
00050  * This function reloads the specified module, or if no modules are specified,
00051  * it will reload all loaded modules.
00052  *
00053  * \note Modules are reloaded using their reload() functions, not unloading
00054  * them and loading them again.
00055  * 
00056  * \return 0 if the specified module was not found.
00057  * \retval 1 if the module was found but cannot be reloaded.
00058  * \retval -1 if a reload operation is already in progress.
00059  * \retval 2 if the specfied module was found and reloaded.
00060  */
00061 int ast_module_reload(const char *name);
00062 
00063 /*!
00064  * \brief Process reload requests received during startup.
00065  *
00066  * This function requests that the loader execute the pending reload requests
00067  * that were queued during server startup.
00068  *
00069  * \note This function will do nothing if the server has not completely started
00070  *       up.  Once called, the reload queue is emptied, and further invocations
00071  *       will have no affect.
00072  */
00073 void ast_process_pending_reloads(void);
00074 
00075 /*! \brief Load XML documentation. Provided by xmldoc.c 
00076  *  \retval 1 on error.
00077  *  \retval 0 on success. 
00078  */
00079 int ast_xmldoc_load_documentation(void);
